me.dumfing.menus

Class Menu

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.dumfing.menus.Menu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientLobbyMenu, ClientPickingInfoMenu, ConnectingMenu, LoadingMenu, MainMenu, ServerBrowser, ServerInfoMenu, ServerRunningGameMenu, SettingsMenu

    public class Menu
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor
    WORK IN PROGRESS
    Menu.java
    Aaron Li
    Provides basic functions for all menus, animated backgrounds, buttons, images, textboxes
